sentences.sContent: Some hotel signage etched pattern is needed, it is how to make the principle of it?
sentences.sContent_eng: Some hotel signage etched pattern is needed, it is how to make the principle of it?
sentences.sCn: 一些酒店的标识牌的花纹是需要蚀刻的，那是如何制作的原理呢？

sentences.sContent: After that, a layer of nickel was electrodeposited on the opal, which was then etched away. The porosity of the nickel layer was then increased using electropolishing.
sentences.sContent_eng: After that, a layer of nickel was electrodeposited on the opal, which was then etched away. The porosity of the nickel layer was then increased using electropolishing.
sentences.sCn: 然后，在猫眼石结构表面用电沉积法镀上一层镍膜，之后把猫眼石蚀刻掉，再经过电解抛光，增加这些镍膜空隙度。

sentences.sContent: Sign etched on the job officially here.
sentences.sContent_eng: Sign etched on the job officially here.
sentences.sCn: 标牌的作业正式蚀刻在这里开始。
